alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Worcester, southwestern Norfolk, northwestern Bristol and northeastern Providence Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woonsocket, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Providence, Pawtucket, Woonsocket, Cumberland, North Providence, Franklin, Johnston, North Attleborough, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Bellingham, Burrillville, Seekonk, North Smithfield, Wrentham, Blackstone, Plainville and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
